price: Reci: “O jevreji, ako tvrdite da ste vi od svih ljudi jedini Allahovi miljenici, onda smrt poželite ako istinu govorite.”
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوٓاْ إِن زَعَمۡتُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ لِلَّهِ مِن دُونِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُاْ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul yāayyuhā alladhīna hādū in zaʿamtum annakum awliyāu lillahi min dūni al-nāsi fatamannawū al-mawta in kuntum ṣādiqīna
